description: One of Ayano`s best friends and classmates. Yukari, along with Nanase, often teases Ayano about her apparent crush on Kazuma. She is well-connected to the information network of the student body and often knows what is happening around the school. Yukari`s information extends beyond the school and into many areas of the Tokyo metropolis. She also carries a taser of unexplained origin with her.
name: Shinomiya Yukari
